Package it.unibg.cs.jtvguide.xmltv

Interface Summary
JTVGuidePrefs An interface to group constants
XMLTVConfigurator An interface for configurign XMLTV
 

Class Summary
MD5Checksum An MD5 hash checker (used for test changes in the program's configuration file.
UserPreferences A class to represent user's preferences
XMLTVCommander A class to command XMLTV to configure and download schedules
XMLTVParserImpl A parser for XMLTV output file
XMLTVScheduleInspector A class to inspect xmltv schedule
